title: SoFi Technologies, AMC, Salesforce, Snowflake: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today; SoFi Technologies lifted its earnings guidance; Snowflake results are due after the close
text:
* Shares of crude producers were broadly higher premarket as oil prices extended their recent gains. Exxon Mobil, ConocoPhillips, Occidental Petroleum. Exxon said it is halting operations at a multibillion-dollar oil and gas project in Russia and will make no further investments in the country.

* One-time meme stock AMC Entertainment added 0.9% premarket after the theater chain reported a better-than-expected profitability metric for the latest quarter as it welcomed back moviegoers.

* Salesforce.com rose 4.4% ahead of the bell. The business software provider logged higher revenue in the fourth quarter and raised its annual sales outlook.

* Ross Stores gained 6.6% after the retailer topped Wall Street expectations for its fourth quarter, said it plans to open more stores, and announced a dividend increase.

* Dollar Tree slipped 3.8% after it provided a 2022 earnings forecast ahead of analysts' consensus estimates, but with a revenue view slightly below expectations.

* Abercrombie & Fitch dropped 9.7% premarket after the clothing and accessories retailer reported fourth-quarter earnings and sales that missed expectations.

* Hewlett Packard Enterprise rose 5.1%. The company raised its earnings forecast for the year after reporting stronger-than-expected earnings for the January quarter.

* Shares of solar-panel maker First Solar fell 12% premarket after its quarterly sales fell short of Wall Street expectations and its 2022 sales guidance was lower than estimates.

* Snowflake, Okta and Splunk are among the companies reporting earnings after Wednesday's close.

Chart of the Day

* Money managers are taking extraordinary steps to steady exchange-traded funds exposed to Russia. The closure of the country's stock market this week has created a rift between the pricing of some funds and the value of their underlying assets. That essentially leaves investors guessing at the value of the Russian assets.

Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com

SoFi Technologies, AMC, Salesforce, Snowflake: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
